headline.main: Chattanooga Shooting a 'Heinous Crime'-U.S. Defense Secretary Carter
headline.print_headline: Chattanooga Shooting a 'Heinous Crime'-U.S. Defense Secretary Carter

docs.snippet: U.S. Secretary of Defense Ash Carter called the killing on Thursday of four Marines at two military facilities in Chattanooga, Tennessee, a "senseless act of violence" and a "heinous crime."...
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Secretary of Defense Ash Carter called the killing on Thursday of four Marines at two military facilities in Chattanooga, Tennessee, a "senseless act of violence" and a "heinous crime."

docs.snippet: Stocks closed Thursday's session higher on strong earnings. After the bell, Google reported better-than-expected results. Bobbi Rebell reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Stocks closed Thursday's session higher on strong earnings. After the bell, Google reported better-than-expected results. Bobbi Rebell reports.

headline.main: No sign of escaped drug lord Guzman
headline.sub: No sign of escaped drug lord Guzman

docs.snippet: Federal police patrol the streets of Almodoya de Juarez, passing out flyers asking for information leading to recapture of drug kingpin Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman. Nathan Frandino reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Federal police patrol the streets of Almodoya de Juarez, passing out flyers asking for information leading to recapture of drug kingpin Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman. Nathan Frandino reports.

headline.main: Foreign Holdings of US Treasury Securities Slip in May
headline.print_headline: Foreign Holdings of US Treasury Securities Slip in May

docs.snippet: Foreign holdings of U.S. Treasury securities fell in May for a second straight month even though China, the largest foreign owner of Treasury debt, boosted its holdings....
docs.lead_paragraph: Foreign holdings of U.S. Treasury securities fell in May for a second straight month even though China, the largest foreign owner of Treasury debt, boosted its holdings.

headline.main: eBay readies to split from PayPal
headline.sub: eBay readies to split from PayPal

docs.snippet: eBay is getting ready for big split with PayPal, selling its enterprise business to streamline operations. Bobbi Rebell reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: eBay is getting ready for big split with PayPal, selling its enterprise business to streamline operations. Bobbi Rebell reports.

headline.main: Snyder Helps Inaugurate Detroit's Outdoor Adventure Center
headline.print_headline: Snyder Helps Inaugurate Detroit's Outdoor Adventure Center

docs.snippet: Gov. Rick Snyder has helped mark the opening of the state's new Outdoor Adventure Center in downtown Detroit....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Snyder has helped mark the opening of the state's new Outdoor Adventure Center in downtown Detroit.

headline.main: Obama Says U.S. to Be Thorough, Prompt in Getting Answers to Tennessee Shooting
headline.print_headline: Obama Says U.S. to Be Thorough, Prompt in Getting Answers to Tennessee Shooting

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama said on Thursday that U.S. officials would be thorough and prompt about getting answers after a suspected gunman opened fire at two military facilities in Chattanooga, Tennessee, killing four Marines....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama said on Thursday that U.S. officials would be thorough and prompt about getting answers after a suspected gunman opened fire at two military facilities in Chattanooga, Tennessee, killing four Marines.

headline.main: VW, GM Shudder as China Profit Engine Sputters
headline.print_headline: VW, GM Shudder as China Profit Engine Sputters

docs.snippet: Shockwaves from a drop in Chinese car demand are reverberating in Wolfsburg, Germany and Detroit, Michigan, where VW and General Motors are feeling the effects of a slowdown in a market that has been their big profit engine....
docs.lead_paragraph: Shockwaves from a drop in Chinese car demand are reverberating in Wolfsburg, Germany and Detroit, Michigan, where VW and General Motors are feeling the effects of a slowdown in a market that has been their big profit engine.

headline.main: Judge Rejects Government Argument in No Fly List Lawsuit
headline.print_headline: Judge Rejects Government Argument in No Fly List Lawsuit

docs.snippet: A federal judge on Thursday rejected the U.S. government's effort to invoke its state-secrets privilege to quash a lawsuit challenging the constitutionality of its No Fly List....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Thursday rejected the U.S. government's effort to invoke its state-secrets privilege to quash a lawsuit challenging the constitutionality of its No Fly List.

headline.main: SeaWorld Suspends Worker Accused of Posing as PETA Activist
headline.print_headline: SeaWorld Suspends Worker Accused of Posing as PETA Activist

docs.snippet: SeaWorld suspended an employee accused of posing for years as an animal-rights activist and trying to incite violence among peaceful protesters, company officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: SeaWorld suspended an employee accused of posing for years as an animal-rights activist and trying to incite violence among peaceful protesters, company officials said.
